/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by modern buildings, their glass facades reflecting the clear blue sky. Cars of various colors are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. Pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a human element to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
